item.description: Take exit 17 off of 495 and head toward Franklin . Turn right onto Hayward St., which is no more than a mile from 495, across from a new dental building. Then, turn in at the first mill building on your right, and drive to the back of the lot, near the Happy Tails Doggy Daycare sign.
item.why: This class is all about moving the way a woman's body is meant to move. Come to learn some steps, to get a bellydance refresher, or to join our dance party! (Sorry guys; this class is for women only.)
item.name: A free bellydance class
